author: Special Correspondent
text:
Marumalarchi Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (MDMK) general secretary Vaiko has said that the sword of Damocles is hanging over both the ruling All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (AIADMK) and the DMK, and the people of the Tamil Nadu, especially youths and neutral voters, have made up their mind to reject the two parties in the coming Assembly elections.

Addressing a public meeting organised in memory of language martyrs here on Monday night, Mr. Vaiko, who is heading the People Welfare Front (PWF), said that if the disproportionate assets case was a sword hung over the head of the AIADMK, the multi-crore 2G spectrum case was the sword over the head of the DMK.

In a blistering attack, Mr. Vaiko said that the two parties which ruled the State alternatively for more than 50 years, vied with each other in corruption and the people were determined to pack them off in the coming elections.
title: Sword of Damocles hanging over DMK, AIADMK: Vaiko
